Package helpers

Class Mushroom

java.lang.Object
helpers.Mushroom
All Implemented Interfaces:
Piece
public class Mushroom
extends java.lang.Object
implements Piece
Class that represents a mushroom piece in the game.

    • getLevelEditorIcon

      public javax.swing.ImageIcon getLevelEditorIcon()
      Returns the icon that should be used by the LevelEditorButtons.

      Note that this could be obtained from the getImageIcon function, but due to the usage of fox such a function helps in readability and separation of duties.

      Specified by:
      getLevelEditorIcon in interface Piece
      Returns:
      ImageIcon to be used for the LevelEditorButton
